projects.name: Microservice
projects.description: Developed a Spring Boot microservice with CRUD operations, integrated with Postgres, and containerized using Docker. Used Swagger for API documentation, Postman for endpoint testing, and implemented JUnit test cases for robust validation.

projects.name: Detection System for Helmet Less Bikers
projects.description: Developed a real-time helmet-less detection system using machine learning. This system detects and classifies individuals without helmets in video streams, aiding in safety enforcement and risk mitigation in various settings.

projects.name: CV Generator
projects.description: Crafted a user-friendly website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to gather user information and dynamically generate a professional CV, simplifying the CV creation process.

experiences.description: Leveraged an IAC tool to deploy virtual machine-based web servers and load balancers. Hosted a website on two virtual machine instances, integrated into the backend of an Azure Load Balancer.

Developed and implemented a chatbot using AI technologies, enhancing user interaction, and automating responses. Utilized natural language processing (NLP) tools to improve chatbot understanding and response quality.

full_output.name: Vineet Kumar
achievements_and_awards: Three-time Dean's List Award honoree for sustained academic excellence.
